entry.title: 2024长城杯初赛Problem复现
entry.content:
# Problem

看似很简单，b=A∗xb=A*xb=A∗x，不就是个矩阵乘法嘛A、bA、bA、b 都已知，直接x=b∗A−1x=b*A^{-1}x=b∗A−1 不就好了。实则没这么简单。

原因就在于AAA 中的元素全都是浮点数，你回去会有精度损失，无法还原 flag。这就需要我们把AAA 中的元素放大 (乘上一个很大的数，如102010^{20}1020)，去掉小数点，但是这样处理之后会有误差，还要误差考虑进去，经典的 LWE 问题。

设误差为sss，则b+s=Axb+s=Axb+s=Ax，将 LWE 问题转换为 SVP 问题，因为A,bA,bA,b 已知，s,xs,xs,x 未知

构造矩阵(A0−b1)\begin{pmatrix}A & 0 \\ -b & 1 \end{pmatrix}(A−b​01​) 作为基向量，有\begin{pmatrix}x&1 \end{pmatrix}\begin{pmatrix}A & 0 \\ -b & 1 \end{pmatrix}=\begin{pmatrix}s & 1 \end

对(A0−b1)\begin{pmatrix}A & 0 \\ -b & 1 \end{pmatrix}(A−b​01​) 格基规约，利用 LLL 算法得到\begin{pmatrix}s& 1 \end

因此x=\begin{pmatrix}s& 1 \end{pmatrix}\begin{pmatrix}A & 0 \\ -b & 1 \end{pmatrix}^

entry.title: sqlmap的使用
entry.content:
本文基本上翻译自https://github.com/sqlmapproject/sqlmap/wiki/Usage

用法

输出的详细程度

选项: -v

这个选项就可以规定输出报告的详细程度. 一共有7个等级的详细程度.默认等级是1,只显示消息,警告, 错误,关键信息和Python tracebacks*(如果有的话)

  • 0: 只显示Python tracebacks, 错误和关键信息.
  • 1: +消息和警告信息.
  • 2: +调试信息.
  • 3: +注入的payloads.
  • 4: +HTTP请求.
  • 5: +HTTP响应头.
  • 6: +HTTP response页内容.

A reasonable level of verbosity to further understand what sqlmap does under the hood is level 2, primarily for the detection phase and the take-over functionalities. Whereas if you want to see the SQL payloads the tools sends, level 3 is your best choice. 这个 level is also recommended to be used when you feed the developers with a potential bug rep或者t, make sure you send along with the standard output the traffic log file generated with 选项 -t. In order to further debug potential bugs 或者 unexpected behaviours, we recommend you to set the verbosity to level 4 或者 above. It should be noted that there is also a possibility to set the verbosity by using the sh或者ter version of 这个 选项 where number of letters v inside the provided switch (instead of 选项) determines the verbosity level (e.g. -v instead of -v 2, -vv instead of -v 3, -vvv instead of -v 4, etc.)

目标

至少提供一个目标.

直接连接到数据库

选项: -d

针对单个数据库运行sqlmap. 该选项接受的格式如下:

  • DBMS://USER:PASSW或者D@DBMS_IP:DBMS_P或者T/DATABASE_NAME (MySQL, 或者acle, Microsoft SQL Server, PostgreSQL等.)
  • DBMS://DATABASE_FILEPATH (SQLite, Microsoft Access, Firebird等.)

例如:

目标URL

选项: -u 或者 --url

针对单个目标URL运行sqlmap. 该目标URL的格式如下:

例如:

从Burp或者WebScarab 代理日志中解析目标

选项: -l

除了针对单个目标URL, 我们也可以测试和注入由Burp或WebScarab代理的HTTP请求. 这个选项需要代理的HTTP请求的日志文件作为参数.

扫描文本文件列出的多个目标

选项: -m

针对批量文件提供的多个目标URLs, sqlmap将会一个一个地扫描其中的每一个.

该批量文件名作为这个选项的参数:

从文件中载入HTTP请求

选项: -r

sqlmap的一个功能是从文本文件中加载原始HTTP请求. 这样的话可以跳过一系列操作 (例如. 设置cookies, POST传数据等).

能作为这个选项的一个参数的HTTP请求文件样例内容:

Note that if the request is over HTTPS, you can use 这个 in conjunction with switch --force-ssl to force SSL connection to 443/tcp. Alternatively, you can append :443 to the end of the Host header value.

Parse target addresses 从 piped-input (i.e. stdin)

Even though sqlmap already has capabilities for target crawling, in case that user has other preferences for such task, he can provide the target addresses as a piped-in input directly 从 some other tool of choice (e.g. waybackurls). It should be noted that links will be automatically parsed 从 such content, thus there are no constraints for input format.

例如:

Process Google dork results as target addresses

选项: -g

It is also possible to test and inject on GET parameters based on results of your Google d或者k.

这个 选项 makes sqlmap negotiate with the search engine its session cookie to be able to perform a search, then sqlmap will retrieve Google first 100 results for the Google d或者k expression with GET parameters asking you if you want to test and inject on each possible affected URL.

例如:

Load 选项s 从 a configuration INI file

选项: -c

It is possible to pass user’s 选项s 从 a configuration INI file, an example is sqlmap.conf.

Note that if you provide other 选项s 从 command line, those are evaluated when running sqlmap and overwrite those provided in the configuration file.

Request

这些选项s能指定如何连接目标URL.

HTTP请求方法

选项: --method

sqlmap能在HTTP请求中自动探测到正确的HTTP请求方法. 然而,一些情况下, 我们还是需要使用具体的HTTP请求方法(如PUT) that is not used by automatism. 这是我们就需要用到这个选项 (如—method=PUT`).

HTTP数据

选项: --data

HTTP请求的默认方法是GET, 但你能通过以POST请求发送数据的方式来隐秘地将请求方法改成POST. Such data, being those parameters, are tested for SQL injection as well as any provided GET parameters.

例如:

参数分隔符

选项: --param-del

我们有时需要重写sqlmap的默认分隔符(如GET和POST数据中的&) 来正确地分离并分别处理每一个参数.

例如:

HTTP Cookie header

选项s and switch: --cookie, --cookie-del, --live-cookies, --load-cookies and --drop-set-cookie

These 选项s and switches can be used in two situations:

  • The web application 需要s authentication based upon cookies and you have such data.
  • You want to detect and exploit SQL injection on such header values.

Either reason brings you to need to send cookies with sqlmap requests, the steps to go through are the following:

  • Login to the application with your favourite browser.
  • Get the HTTP Cookie 从 the browser’s preferences 或者 从 the HTTP proxy screen and copy to the clipboard.
  • Go back to your shell and run sqlmap by pasting your clipboard as value of the 选项 --cookie.

Note that the HTTP Cookie header values are usually separated by a ; character, not by an &. sqlmap can recognize these as separate sets of parameter=value too, as well as GET and POST parameters. In case that the separation character is other than ; it can be specified by using 选项 --cookie-del.

If at any time during the communication, the web application responds with Set-Cookie headers, sqlmap will automatically use its value in all further HTTP requests as the Cookie header. sqlmap will also automatically test those values for SQL injection. 这个 can be avoided by providing the switch --drop-set-cookie - sqlmap will ignore any coming Set-Cookie header.

Vice versa, if you provide a HTTP Cookie header with 选项 --cookie and the target URL sends an HTTP Set-Cookie header at any time, sqlmap will ask you which set of cookies to use for the following HTTP requests.

选项 --live-cookies can be used to provide a cookies file which will be used for loading of up-to-date values. 这个 means that that same file will be read pri或者 to each request to get the latest value for HTTP Cookie header.

There is also an 选项 --load-cookies which can be used to provide a special file containing Netscape/wget formatted cookies.

Note that also the HTTP Cookie header is tested against SQL injection if the --level is set to 2 或者 above. Read below for details.

HTTP User-Agent header

选项 and switch: --user-agent and --random-agent

By 默认sqlmap performs HTTP requests with the following User-Agent header value:

However, it is possible to fake it with the 选项 --user-agent by providing custom User-Agent as the 选项’s 参数.

Moreover, by providing the switch --random-agent, sqlmap will randomly select a User-Agent 从 the ./txt/user-agents.txt textual file and use it for all HTTP requests within the session.

Some sites perform a server-side check of HTTP User-Agent header value and fail the HTTP response if a valid User-Agent is not provided, its value is not expected 或者 is blacklisted by a web application firewall 或者 similar intrusion prevention system. In 这个 case sqlmap will show you a message as follows:

Note that also the HTTP User-Agent header is tested against SQL injection if the --level is set to 3 或者 above. Read below for details.

HTTP Host header

选项: --host

You can manually set HTTP Host header value. By 默认HTTP Host header is parsed 从 a provided target URL.

Note that also the HTTP Host header is tested against SQL injection if the --level is set to 5. Read below for details.

HTTP Referer header

选项: --referer

It is possible to fake the HTTP Referer header value. By 默认no HTTP Referer header is sent in HTTP requests if not explicitly set.

Note that also the HTTP Referer header is tested against SQL injection if the --level is set to 3 或者 above. Read below for details.

Extra HTTP headers

选项: --headers

It is possible to provide extra HTTP headers by setting the 选项 --headers. Each header must be separated by a newline and it is much easier to provide them 从 the configuration INI file. You can take a look at the sample sqlmap.conf file for such case.

Example against a MySQL target:

HTTP protocol authentication

选项s: --auth-type and --auth-cred

These 选项s can be used to specify which HTTP protocol authentication back-end web server implements and the valid credentials to be used to perform all HTTP requests to the target application.

The three supp或者ted HTTP protocol authentication mechanisms are:

  • Basic
  • Digest
  • NTLM

While the credentials’ syntax is username:passw或者d.

Example of valid syntax:

HTTP protocol private key authentication

选项: --auth-file

这个 选项 should be used in cases when the web server 需要s proper client-side certificate and a private key for authentication. Supplied value should be a PEM formatted key_file that contains your certificate and a private key.

Example of generation of a key_file.txt that is compatible with --auth-file:

Ignore (problematic) HTTP err或者 code

选项 --ignore-code

In case that you want to test the site that occasionally returns HTTP err或者 code that causes problems to regular sqlmap run (e.g. 401 (Unauth或者ized)), while you want to ignore it and continue on with tests, you can use 选项 --ignore-code

HTTP(S) proxy

选项s and switch: --proxy, --proxy-cred, --proxy-file and --ignore-proxy

It is possible to provide an HTTP(S) proxy address to pass by the HTTP(S) requests to the target URL with 选项 --proxy. The syntax of HTTP(S) proxy value is http://url:p或者t.

If the HTTP(S) proxy 需要s authentication, you can provide the credentials in the format username:passw或者d to the 选项 --proxy-cred.

In case that you want to use (disposable) proxy list, skipping to the next proxy on any sign of a connection problem (e.g. blocking of invasive IP address), 选项 --proxy-file can be used by providing filename of a file containing bulk list of proxies.

Switch --ignore-proxy should be used when you want to run sqlmap against a target part of a local area network by ign或者ing the system-wide set HTTP(S) proxy server setting.

tor anonymity network

Switches and 选项s: --tor, --tor-p或者t, --tor-type and --check-tor

If, for any reason, you need to stay anonymous, instead of passing by a 单个 predefined HTTP(S) proxy server, you can configure a tor client together with Privoxy (或者 similar) on your machine as explained in tor installation guides. Then you can use a switch --tor and sqlmap will try to automatically set tor proxy connection settings.

In case that you want to manually set the type and p或者t of used tor proxy, you can do it with 选项s --tor-type and --tor-p或者t (e.g. --tor-type=SOCKS5 --tor-p或者t 9050).

You are strongly advised to use --check-tor occasionally to be sure that everything was set up properly. There are cases when tor bundles (e.g. Vidalia) come misconfigured (或者 reset previously set configuration) giving you a false sense of anonymity. Using 这个 switch sqlmap will check that everything works as expected by sending a 单个 request to an official Are you using tor? page before any target requests. In case that check fails, sqlmap will warn you and abruptly exit.

Delay between each HTTP request

选项: --delay

It is possible to specify a number of seconds to hold between each HTTP(S) request. The valid value is a float, for instance 0.5 means half a second. By 默认, no delay is set.

Seconds to wait before timeout connection

选项: --timeout

It is possible to specify a number of seconds to wait before considering the HTTP(S) request timed out. The valid value is a float, for instance 10.5 means ten seconds and a half. By 默认30 seconds are set.

Maximum number of retries when the HTTP connection timeouts

选项: --retries

It is possible to specify the maximum number of retries when the HTTP(S) connection timeouts. By 默认it retries up to three times.

Randomly change value for given parameter(s)

选项: --randomize

It is possible to specify parameter names whose values you want to be randomly changed during each request. Length and type are being kept acc或者ding to provided 或者iginal values.

Filtering targets 从 provided proxy log using regular expression

选项: --scope

Rather than using all hosts parsed 从 provided logs with 选项 -l, you can specify valid Python regular expression to be used for filtering desired ones.

Example of valid syntax:

Avoid your session to be destroyed after too many unsuccessful requests

选项s: --safe-url, --safe-post, --safe-req and --safe-freq

Sometimes web applications 或者 inspection technology in between destroys the session if a certain number of unsuccessful requests is performed. 这个 might occur during the detection phase of sqlmap 或者 when it exploits any of the blind SQL injection types. Reason why is that the SQL payload does not necessarily returns output and might therefore raise a signal to either the application session management 或者 the inspection technology.

To bypass 这个 limitation set by the target, you can provide any (或者 combination of) 选项:

  • --safe-url: URL address to visit frequently during testing.
  • --safe-post: HTTP POST data to send to a given safe URL address.
  • --safe-req: Load and use safe HTTP request 从 a file.
  • --safe-freq: Test requests between two visits to a given safe location.

这个 way, sqlmap will visit every a predefined number of requests a certain safe URL without performing any kind of injection against it.

Turn off URL encoding of parameter values

Switch: --skip-urlencode

Depending on parameter placement (e.g. GET) its value could be URL encoded by 默认. In some cases, back-end web servers do not follow RFC standards and 需要 values to be send in their raw non-encoded form. Use --skip-urlencode in those kind of cases.

绕过anti-CSRF保护

选项: --csrf-token and --csrf-url

许多站点存在着anti-CSRF令牌的字段, 在页面响应的时候这个令牌会被设置成一个随机数并通过隐藏字段发送. sqlmap虽然能够识别和绕过这种类型的保护, 但我们能通过选项 --csrf-token 和 --csrf-url 来进一步微调. 选项 --csrf-token 能用来设置包含这个随机化token隐藏值的名称. 这种情况适用于当网站在设置这个字段时使用了不标准的名称. 选项 --csrf-url 用于从任意URL地址中获取token值. 这个选项适用于如果这个易受攻击的站点在第一个位置不包含必要的token值, 而我们可以从其他位置获取到它.

强制使用SSL/HTTPS

选项: --force-ssl

当用户想要强制对目标使用SSL/HTTPS请求,可以添加这个选项. 这个选项适用于当url正被 --crawl选项爬取或者当Burp正在用 -l提供日志.

在每个请求时都执行自定义Python代码

选项: --eval

当用户想要改变(或者添加新的)参数值时, 特别是已知这些参数的依赖关系时,他能使用sqlmap来自定义Python代码通过选项 --eval , 这些代码会在每个请求发送之前执行.

例如:

这样执行后,每个请求都会根据id重新计算出一个hash .

优化

这些选项用来优化sqlmap的性能.

Bundle optimization

选项: -o

这个 switch is an alias that implicitly sets the following 选项s and switches:

  • --keep-alive
  • --null-connection
  • --threads=3 if not set to a higher value.

Read below for details about each switch.

Output prediction

Switch: --predict-output

这个 switch is used in inference alg或者ithm for sequential statistical prediction of characters of value being retrieved. Statistical table with the most promising character values is being built based on items given in txt/common-outputs.txt combined with the knowledge of current enumeration used. In case that the value can be found among the common output values, as the process progresses, subsequent character tables are being narrowed more and more. If used in combination with retrieval of common DBMS entities, as with system table names and privileges, speed up is significant. Of course, you can edit the common outputs file acc或者ding to your needs if, for instance, you notice common patterns in数据库table names 或者 similar.

Note that 这个 switch is not compatible with --threads switch.

HTTP Keep-Alive

Switch: --keep-alive

这个 switch instructs sqlmap to use persistent HTTP(s) connections.

Note that 这个 switch is incompatible with --proxy switch.

HTTP NULL connection

Switch: --null-connection

There are special HTTP request types which can be used to retrieve HTTP response’s size without getting the HTTP body. 这个 knowledge can be used in blind injection technique to distinguish True 从 False responses. When 这个 switch is provided, sqlmap will try to test and exploit two different NULL connection techniques: Range and HEAD. If any of these is supp或者ted by the target web server, speed up will come 从 the obvious saving of used bandwidth.

These techniques are detailed in the white paper Bursting Performances in Blind SQL Injection - Take 2 (Bandwidth).

Note that 这个 switch is incompatible with switch --text-only.

Concurrent HTTP(S) requests

选项: --threads

It is possible to specify the maximum number of concurrent HTTP(S) requests that sqlmap is allowed to do. 这个 feature relies on multi-threading concept and inherits both its pro and its cons.

这个 features applies to the brute-force switches and when the data fetching is done through any of the blind SQL injection techniques. for the latter case, sqlmap first calculates the length of the query output in a 单个 thread, then starts the multi-threading. Each thread is assigned to retrieve one character of the query output. The thread ends when that character is retrieved - it takes up to 7 HTTP(S) requests with the bisection alg或者ithm implemented in sqlmap.

The maximum number of concurrent requests is set to 10 for performance and site reliability reasons.

Note that 这个 选项 is not compatible with switch --predict-output.

Injection

These 选项s can be used to specify which parameters to test for, provide custom injection payloads and 选项al tampering scripts.

Testable parameter(s)

选项s: -p, --skip and --param-exclude

By 默认sqlmap tests all GET parameters and POST parameters. When the value of --level is >= 2 it tests also HTTP Cookie header values. When 这个 value is >= 3 it tests also HTTP User-Agent and HTTP Referer header value for SQL injections. It is however possible to manually specify a comma-separated list of parameter(s) that you want sqlmap to test. 这个 will bypass the dependence on value of --level too.

for instance, to test for GET parameter id and for HTTP User-Agent only, provide -p "id,user-agent".

In case that user wants to exclude certain parameters 从 testing, he can use 选项 --skip. That is especially useful in cases when you want to use higher value for --level and test all available parameters excluding some of HTTP headers n或者mally being tested.

for instance, to skip testing for HTTP header User-Agent and HTTP header Referer at --level=5, provide --skip="user-agent,referer".

There is also a possibility to exclude certain parameters 从 testing based on a regular expression run on their names. In those kind of cases user can use 选项 --param-exclude.

for instance, to skip testing for parameters which contain string token 或者 session in their names, provide --param-exclude="token|session".

URI injection point

There are special cases when injection point is within the URI itself. sqlmap does not perform any automatic test against URI paths, unless manually pointed to. You have to specify these injection points in the command line by appending an asterisk (*) (Note: Havij style %INJECT HERE% is also supp或者ted) after each URI point that you want sqlmap to test for and exploit a SQL injection.

这个 is particularly useful when, for instance, Apache web server’s mod_rewrite module is in use 或者 other similar technologies.

An example of valid command line would be:

Arbitrary injection point

Similar to URI injection point, asterisk (*) (Note: Havij style %INJECT HERE% is also supp或者ted) can also be used to point to the arbitrary injection point inside GET, POST 或者 HTTP headers. Injection point can be specified by marking it inside the GET parameter value(s) provided with 选项 -u, POST parameter value(s) provided with 选项 --data, HTTP header value(s) provided with 选项s -H, --headers, --user-agent, --referer and/或者 --cookie, 或者 at generic place inside HTTP request loaded 从 file with 选项 -r.

An example of valid command line would be:

force the DBMS

选项: --dbms

By 默认sqlmap automatically detects the web application’s back-end数据库management system. sqlmap fully supp或者ts the following数据库management systems:

  • MySQL
  • 或者acle
  • PostgreSQL
  • Microsoft SQL Server
  • Microsoft Access
  • IBM DB2
  • SQLite
  • Firebird
  • Sybase
  • SAP MaxDB
  • Informix
  • MariaDB
  • Percona
  • MemSQL
  • TiDB
  • CockroachDB
  • HSQLDB
  • H2
  • MonetDB
  • Apache Derby
  • Amazon Redshift
  • Vertica
  • Mckoi

If for any reason sqlmap fails to detect the back-end DBMS once a SQL injection has been identified 或者 if you want to avoid an active fingeprint, you can provide the name of the back-end DBMS yourself (e.g. postgresql). for MySQL and Microsoft SQL Server provide them respectively in the form MySQL <version> and Microsoft SQL Server <version>, where <version> is a valid version for the DBMS; for instance 5.0 for MySQL and 2005 for Microsoft SQL Server.

In case you provide --fingerprint together with --dbms, sqlmap will only perform the extensive fingerprint for the specified数据库management system only, read below for further details.

force the数据库management system operating system name

By 默认sqlmap automatically detects the web application’s back-end数据库management system underlying operating system when 这个 information is a dependence of any other provided switch 或者 选项. At the moment the fully supp或者ted operating systems are:

Note that 这个 选项 is not mandatory and it is strongly recommended to use it only if you are absolutely sure about the back-end数据库management system underlying operating system. If you do not know it, let sqlmap automatically identify it for you.

force usage of big numbers for invalidating values

Switch: --invalid-bignum

In cases when sqlmap needs to invalidate 或者iginal parameter value (e.g. id=13) it uses classical negation (e.g. id=-13). With 这个 switch it is possible to force the usage of large integer values to fulfill the same goal (e.g. id=99999999).

Switch: --invalid-logical

Switch: --invalid-string

In cases when sqlmap needs to invalidate 或者iginal parameter value (e.g. id=13) it uses classical negation (e.g. id=-13). With 这个 switch it is possible to force the usage of random strings to fulfill the same goal (e.g. id=akewmc).

Turn off payload casting mechanism

Switch: --no-cast

When retrieving results, sqlmap uses a mechanism where all entries are being casted to string type and replaced with a whitespace character in case of NULL values. That is being made to prevent any erroneous states (e.g. concatenation of NULL values with string values) and to easy the data retrieval process itself. Nevertheless, there are rep或者ted cases (e.g. older versions of MySQL DBMS) where 这个 mechanism needed to be turned-off (using 这个 switch) because of problems with data retrieval itself (e.g. None values are returned back).

Turn off string escaping mechanism

Switch: --no-escape

In cases when sqlmap needs to use (单个-quote delimited) string values inside payloads (e.g. SELECT 'foobar'), those values are automatically being escaped (e.g. SELECT CHAR(102)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(114)). That is being done because of two things: obfuscation of payload content and preventing potential problems with query escaping mechanisms (e.g. magic_quotes and/或者 mysql_real_escape_string) at the back-end server. User can use 这个 switch to turn it off (e.g. to reduce payload size).

Detection

These 选项s can be used to customize the detection phase.

Level

选项: --level

这个 选项 需要s an 参数 which specifies the level of tests to perform. There are five levels. The 默认value is 1 where limited number of tests (requests) are performed. Vice versa, level 5 will test verbosely for a much larger number of payloads and boundaries (as in pair of SQL payload prefix and suffix). The payloads used by sqlmap are specified in the textual file xml/payloads.xml. Following the instructions on top of the file, if sqlmap misses an injection, you should be able to add your own payload(s) to test for too!

Not only 这个 选项 affects which payload sqlmap tries, but also which injection points are taken in exam: GET and POST parameters are always tested, HTTP Cookie header values are tested 从 level 2 and HTTP User-Agent/Referer headers’ value is tested 从 level 3.

All in all, the harder it is to detect a SQL injection, the higher the --level must be set.

It is strongly recommended to higher 这个 value before rep或者ting to the mailing list that sqlmap is not able to detect a certain injection point.

Risk

选项: --risk

这个 选项 需要s an 参数 which specifies the risk of tests to perform. There are three risk values. The 默认value is 1 which is innocuous for the maj或者ity of SQL injection points. Risk value 2 adds to the 默认level the tests for heavy query time-based SQL injections and value 3 adds also 或者-based SQL injection tests.

In some instances, like a SQL injection in an UPDATE statement, injecting an 或者-based payload can lead to an update of all the entries of the table, which is certainly not what the attacker wants. for 这个 reason and others 这个 选项 has been introduced: the user has control over which payloads get tested, the user can arbitrarily choose to use also potentially dangerous ones. As per the previous 选项, the payloads used by sqlmap are specified in the textual file xml/payloads.xml and you are free to edit and add your owns.

Page comparison

选项s: --string, --not-string, --regexp and --code

By 默认the distinction of a True query 从 a False one (rough concept behind boolean-based blind SQL injection vulnerabilities) is done by comparing the injected requests page content with the 或者iginal not injected page content. Not always 这个 concept works because sometimes the page content changes at each refresh even not injecting anything, for instance when the page has a counter, a dynamic advertisement banner 或者 any other part of the HTML which is rendered dynamically and might change in time not only consequently to user’s input. To bypass 这个 limit, sqlmap tries hard to identify these snippets of the response bodies and deal acc或者dingly. Sometimes it may fail, that is why the user can provide a string (--string 选项) which should be present on 或者iginal page (though it is not a 需要ment) and on all True injected query pages, but that it is not on the False ones. Instead of static string, the user can provide a regular expression (--regexp 选项). Alternatively, user can provide a string (--not-string 选项) which is not present on 或者iginal page and not on all True injected query pages, but appears always on False ones.

Such data is easy for an user to retrieve, simply try to inject into the affected parameter an invalid value and compare manually the 或者iginal (not injected) page content with the injected wrong page content. 这个 way the distinction will be based upon string presence 或者 regular expression match.

In cases when user knows that the distinction of a True query 从 a False one can be done using HTTP code (e.g. 200 for True and 401 for False), he can provide that information to sqlmap (e.g. --code=200).

Switches: --text-only and --titles

In cases when user knows that the distinction of a True query 从 a False one can be done using HTML title (e.g. Welcome for True and forbidden for False), he can turn turn on title-based comparison using switch --titles.

In cases with lot of active content (e.g. scripts, embeds, etc.) in the HTTP responses’ body, you can filter pages (switch --text-only) just for their textual content. 这个 way, in a good number of cases, you can automatically tune the detection engine.

Techniques

These 选项s can be used to tweak testing of specific SQL injection techniques.

SQL injection techniques to test for

选项: --technique

这个 选项 can be used to specify which SQL injection type to test for. By 默认sqlmap tests for all types/techniques it supp或者ts.

In certain situations you may want to test only for one 或者 few specific types of SQL injection thought and 这个 is where 这个 选项 comes into play.

这个 选项 需要s an 参数. Such 参数 is a string composed by any combination of B, E, U, S, T and Q characters where each letter stands for a different technique:

  • B: Boolean-based blind
  • E: Err或者-based
  • U: Union query-based
  • S: Stacked queries
  • T: Time-based blind

for instance, you can provide ES if you want to test for and exploit err或者-based and stacked queries SQL injection types only. The 默认value is BEUSTQ.

Note that the string must include stacked queries technique letter, S, when you want to access the file system, takeover the operating system 或者 access Windows registry hives.

选项: --time-sec

It is possible to set the seconds to delay the response when testing for time-based blind SQL injection, by providing the --time-sec 选项 followed by an integer. By 默认it’s value is set to 5 seconds.

By 默认sqlmap tests for UNION query SQL injection technique using 1 to 10 columns. However, 这个 range can be increased up to 50 columns by providing an higher --level value. See the relevant paragraph for more details.

You can manually tell sqlmap to test for 这个 type of SQL injection with a specific range of columns by providing the tool with the 选项 --union-cols followed by a range of integers. for instance, 12-16 means tests for UNION query SQL injection by using 12 up to 16 columns.

By 默认sqlmap tests for UNION query SQL injection technique using NULL character. However, by providing a higher --level value sqlmap will performs tests also with a random number because there are some c或者ner cases where UNION query tests with NULL fail, whereas with a random integer they succeed.

选项: --union-从

In some UNION query SQL injection cases there is a need to enforce the usage of valid and accessible table name in 从 clause. 例如, Microsoft Access 需要s usage of such table. Without providing one UNION query SQL injection won’t be able to perform c或者rectly (e.g. --union-从=users).

DNS exfiltration attack

选项: --dns-domain

DNS exfiltration SQL injection attack is described in paper Data Retrieval over DNS in SQL Injection Attacks, while presentation of it’s implementation inside sqlmap can be found in slides DNS exfiltration using sqlmap.

If user is controlling a machine registered as a DNS domain server (e.g. domain attacker.com) he can turn on 这个 attack by using 这个 选项 (e.g. --dns-domain attacker.com). Prerequisites for it to work is to run a sqlmap with Administrator privileges (usage of privileged p或者t 53) and that one n或者mal (blind) technique is available for exploitation. That’s solely the purpose of 这个 attack is to speed up the process of data retrieval in case that at least one technique has been identified (in best case time-based blind). In case that err或者-based blind 或者 UNION query techniques are available it will be skipped as those are preferred ones by 默认.

选项s: --second-url and --second-req

Second-order SQL injection attack is an attack where result(s) of an injected payload in one vulnerable page is shown (reflected) at the other (e.g. frame). Usually that’s happening because of数据库storage of user provided input at the 或者iginal vulnerable page.

You can manually tell sqlmap to test for 这个 type of SQL injection by using 选项 --second-order with the URL address 或者 --second-req with request file for sending to the server where results are being shown.

These switches can be used to run brute force checks.

The file specified can be either a textual 或者 a binary file. sqlmap will handle it properly.

These techniques are detailed in the white paper Advanced SQL injection to operating system full control.

Example against a Microsoft SQL Server 2005 target to retrieve a binary file:

Upload a file to the数据库server’s file system

选项s: --file-write and --file-dest

It is possible to upload a local file to the数据库server’s file system when the back-end数据库management system is either MySQL, PostgreSQL 或者 Microsoft SQL Server, and the session user has the needed privileges to abuse数据库specific functionalities and architectural weaknesses. The file specified can be either a textual 或者 a binary file. sqlmap will handle it properly.

These techniques are detailed in the white paper Advanced SQL injection to operating system full control.

Example against a MySQL target to upload a binary UPX-compressed file:

Operating system takeover

Run arbitrary operating system command

选项 and switch: --os-cmd and --os-shell

It is possible to run arbitrary commands on the数据库server’s underlying operating system when the back-end数据库management system is either MySQL, PostgreSQL 或者 Microsoft SQL Server, and the session user has the needed privileges to abuse数据库specific functionalities and architectural weaknesses.

On MySQL and PostgreSQL, sqlmap uploads (via the file upload functionality explained above) a shared library (binary file) containing two user-defined functions, sys_exec() and sys_eval(), then it creates these two functions on the数据库and calls one of them to execute the specified command, depending on user’s choice to display the standard output 或者 not. On Microsoft SQL Server, sqlmap abuses the xp_cmdshell stored procedure: if it is disabled (by 默认on Microsoft SQL Server >= 2005), sqlmap re-enables it; if it does not exist, sqlmap creates it 从 scratch.

When the user requests the standard output, sqlmap uses one of the enumeration SQL injection techniques (blind, inband 或者 err或者-based) to retrieve it. Vice versa, if the standard output is not 需要d, stacked query SQL injection technique is used to execute the command.

These techniques are detailed in the white paper Advanced SQL injection to operating system full control.

Example against a PostgreSQL target:

It is also possible to simulate a real shell where you can type as many arbitrary commands as you wish. The 选项 is --os-shell and has the same TAB completion and history functionalities that --sql-shell has.

Where stacked queries has not been identified on the web application (e.g. PHP 或者 ASP with back-end数据库management system being MySQL) and the DBMS is MySQL, it is still possible to abuse the SELECT clause’s INTO OUTFILE to create a web backdo或者 in a writable folder within the web server document root and still get command execution assuming the back-end DBMS and the web server are hosted on the same server. sqlmap supp或者ts 这个 technique and allows the user to provide a comma-separated list of possible document root sub-folders where try to upload the web file stager and the subsequent web backdo或者. Also, sqlmap has its own tested web file stagers and backdo或者s for the following languages:

  • ASP
  • ASP.NET
  • JSP
  • PHP

Out-of-band stateful connection: Meterpreter & friends

Switches and 选项s: --os-pwn, --os-smbrelay, --os-bof, --priv-esc, --msf-path and --tmp-path

It is possible to establish an out-of-band stateful TCP connection between the attacker machine and the数据库server underlying operating system when the back-end数据库management system is either MySQL, PostgreSQL 或者 Microsoft SQL Server, and the session user has the needed privileges to abuse数据库specific functionalities and architectural weaknesses. 这个 channel can be an interactive command prompt, a Meterpreter session 或者 a graphical user interface (VNC) session as per user’s choice.

sqlmap relies on Metasploit to create the shellcode and implements four different techniques to execute it on the数据库server. These techniques are:

  • Database in-mem或者y execution of the Metasploit’s shellcode via sqlmap own user-defined function sys_bineval(). Supp或者ted on MySQL and PostgreSQL - switch --os-pwn.
  • Upload and execution of a Metasploit’s stand-alone payload stager via sqlmap own user-defined function sys_exec() on MySQL and PostgreSQL 或者 via xp_cmdshell() on Microsoft SQL Server - switch --os-pwn.
  • Execution of Metasploit’s shellcode by performing a SMB reflection attack (MS08-068) with a UNC path request 从 the数据库server to the attacker’s machine where the Metasploit smb_relay server exploit listens. Supp或者ted when running sqlmap with high privileges (uid=0) on Linux/Unix and the target DBMS runs as Administrator on Windows - switch --os-smbrelay.
  • Database in-mem或者y execution of the Metasploit’s shellcode by exploiting Microsoft SQL Server 2000 and 2005 sp_replwritetovarbin stored procedure heap-based buffer overflow (MS09-004). sqlmap has its own exploit to trigger the vulnerability with automatic DEP mem或者y protection bypass, but it relies on Metasploit to generate the shellcode to get executed upon successful exploitation - switch --os-bof.

These techniques are detailed in the white paper Advanced SQL injection to operating system full control and in the slide deck Expanding the control over the operating system 从 the database.

Example against a MySQL target:

By 默认MySQL on Windows runs as SYSTEM, however PostgreSQL runs as a low-privileged user postgres on both Windows and Linux. Microsoft SQL Server 2000 by 默认runs as SYSTEM, whereas Microsoft SQL Server 2005 and 2008 run most of the times as NETwork SERVICE and sometimes as LOCAL SERVICE.

It is possible to provide sqlmap with switch --priv-esc to perform a database process’ user privilege escalation via Metasploit’s getsystem command which include, among others, the kitrap0d technique (MS10-015).

Windows registry access

It is possible to access Windows registry when the back-end数据库management system is either MySQL, PostgreSQL 或者 Microsoft SQL Server, and when the web application supp或者ts stacked queries. Also, session user has to have the needed privileges to access it.

Read a Windows registry key value

Switch: --reg-read

Using 这个 switch you can read registry key values.

Write a Windows registry key value

Switch: --reg-add

Using 这个 switch you can write registry key values.

Delete a Windows registry key

Switch: --reg-del

Using 这个 switch you can delete registry keys.

Auxiliary registry 选项s

选项s: --reg-key, --reg-value, --reg-data and --reg-type

These 选项s can be used to provide data needed for proper running of switches --reg-read, --reg-add and --reg-del. So, instead of providing registry key information when asked, you can use them at command prompt as program 参数s.

With --reg-key 选项 you specify used Windows registry key path, with --reg-value value item name inside provided key, with --reg-data value data, while with --reg-type 选项 you specify type of the value item.

A sample command line for adding a registry key hive follows:

General

These 选项s can be used to set some general working parameters.

Load session 从 a stored (.sqlite) file

选项: -s

sqlmap automatically creates a persistent session SQLite file for each target, inside dedicated output directory, where it stores all data 需要d for session resumal. If user wants to explicitly set the session file location (e.g. for storing of session data for multiple targets at one place) he can use 这个 选项.

Log HTTP(s) traffic to a textual file

选项: -t

这个 选项 需要s an 参数 that specified the textual file to write all HTTP(s) traffic generated by sqlmap - HTTP(S) requests and HTTP(S) responses.

这个 is useful primarily for debug purposes - when you provide the developers with a potential bug rep或者t, send 这个 file too.

Set answers for questions

选项: --answers

In case that user wants to automatically set up answers for questions, even if --batch is used, using 这个 选项 he can do it by providing any part of question together with answer after an equal sign. Also, answers for different question can be split with delimiter character ,.

Example against a MySQL target:

Declare parameters containing Base64 encoded data

选项: --base64

In case that the target web application is using Base64 encoding to store data inside specific parameters (e.g. Base64 encoded JSON dictionary), user can declare it with 选项 --base64 and thus instruct sqlmap to properly test the underlying values.

Example usage (Note: Base64('{"id": 1}') == 'eyJpZCI6IDF9'):

Act in non-interactive mode

Switch: --batch

If you want sqlmap to run as a batch tool, without any user’s interaction when sqlmap 需要s it, you can force that by using switch --batch. 这个 will leave sqlmap to go with a 默认behaviour whenever user’s input would be 需要d.

Binary content retrieval

选项 --binary-fields

In case of binary content retrieval, like in example of tables having column(s) with stored binary values (e.g. column passw或者d with binary stored passw或者d hash values), it is possible to use 选项 --binary-fields for (extra) proper handling by sqlmap. All those fields (i.e. table columns) are then retrieved and represented in their hexadecimal representation, so afterwards they could be properly processed with other tools (e.g. john).

Custom (blind) SQL injection charset

选项: --charset

During boolean-based blind and time-based blind SQL injection cases, user can force the usage of custom charset to speed-up the data retrieval process. 例如, in case of dumping message digest values (e.g. SHA1), by using (e.g.) --charset="0123456789abcdef" expected number of requests is around 30% less than in regular run.

Crawl the website starting 从 the target URL

选项: --crawl

sqlmap can collect potentially vulnerable links by collecting them (crawling) starting 从 the target location. Using 这个 选项 user can set a depth (distance 从 a starting location) below which sqlmap won’t go in collecting phase, as the process is being done recursively as long as there are new links to be visited.

Example run against a MySQL target:

选项 --crawl-exclude

With 这个 选项 you can exclude pages 从 crawling by providing a regular expression. 例如, if you want to skip all pages that have the keyw或者d logout in their paths, you can use --crawl-exclude=logout.

Delimiting character used in CSV output

选项: --csv-del

When data being dumped is stored into the CSV format (--dump-format=CSV), entries have to be separated with a “separation value” (默认is ,). In case that user wants to override its 默认value he can use 这个 选项 (e.g. --csv-del=";").

DBMS authentication credentials

选项: --dbms-cred

In some cases user will be warned that some operations failed because of lack of current DBMS user privileges and that he could try to use 这个 选项. In those cases, if he provides admin user credentials to sqlmap by using 这个 选项, sqlmap will try to rerun the problematic part with specialized “run as” mechanisms (e.g. OPENROWSET on Microsoft SQL Server) using those credentials.

format of dumped data

选项: --dump-format

sqlmap supp或者ts three different types of formatting when storing dumped table data into the c或者responding file inside an output directory: CSV, HTML and SQLITE. 默认one is CSV, where each table row is stored into a textual file line by line, and where each entry is separated with a comma character , (或者 one provided with 选项 --csv-del). In case of HTML, output is being stored into a HTML file, where each row is represented with a row inside a formatted table. In case of SQLITE, output is being stored into a SQLITE database, where 或者iginal table content is replicated into the c或者responding table having a same name.

force character encoding used for data retrieval

选项: --encoding

for proper decoding of character data sqlmap uses either web server provided information (e.g. HTTP header Content-Type) 或者 a heuristic result coming 从 a 3rd party library chardet.

Nevertheless, there are cases when 这个 value has to be overwritten, especially when retrieving data containing international non-ASCII letters (e.g. --encoding=GBK). It has to be noted that there is a possibility that character information is going to be irreversibly lost due to implicit incompatibility between stored数据库content and used数据库connector at the target side.

Estimated time of arrival

Switch: --eta

It is possible to calculate and show in real time the estimated time of arrival to retrieve each query output. 这个 is shown when the technique used to retrieve the output is any of the blind SQL injection types.

Example against an 或者acle target affected only by boolean-based blind SQL injection:

Then:

As you can see, sqlmap first calculates the length of the query output, then estimates the time of arrival, shows the progress in percentage and counts the number of retrieved output characters.

Flush session files

选项: --flush-session

As you are already familiar with the concept of a session file 从 the description above, it is good to know that you can flush the content of that file using 选项 --flush-session. 这个 way you can avoid the caching mechanisms implemented by 默认in sqlmap. Other possible way is to manually remove the session file(s).

Parse and test forms’ input fields

Switch: --forms

Say that you want to test against SQL injections a huge search form 或者 you want to test a login bypass (typically only two input fields named like username and passw或者d), you can either pass to sqlmap the request in a request file (-r), set the POSTed data acc或者dingly (--data) 或者 let sqlmap do it for you!

Both of the above mentioned instances, and many others, appear as <form> and <input> tags in HTML response bodies and 这个 is where 这个 switch comes into play.

Provide sqlmap with --forms as well as the page where the form can be found as the target URL (-u) and sqlmap will request the target URL for you, parse the forms it has and guide you through to test for SQL injection on those form input fields (parameters) rather than the target URL provided.

Ignore query results stored in session file

Switch: --fresh-queries

As you are already familiar with the concept of a session file 从 the description above, it is good to know that you can ignore the query results by using 选项 --fresh-queries. 这个 way you can keep the session file untouched and for a selected run, avoid the resuming/restoring of queries output.

Use DBMS hex function(s) for data retrieval

Switch: --hex

In lost of cases retrieval of non-ASCII data 需要s special needs. One solution for that problem is usage of DBMS hex function(s). Turned on by 这个 switch, data is encoded to it’s hexadecimal form before being retrieved and afterwards unencoded to it’s 或者iginal form.

Example against a PostgreSQL target:

Custom output directory path

选项: --output-dir

sqlmap by 默认stores session and result files inside a subdirectory output. In case you want to use a different location, you can use 这个 选项 (e.g. --output-dir=/tmp).

Parse DBMS err或者 messages 从 response pages

Switch: --parse-err或者s

If the web application is configured in debug mode so that it displays in the HTTP responses the back-end数据库management system err或者 messages, sqlmap can parse and display them for you.

这个 is useful for debugging purposes like understanding why a certain enumeration 或者 takeover switch does not work - it might be a matter of session user’s privileges and in 这个 case you would see a DBMS err或者 message along the lines of Access denied for user <SESSION USER>.

Example against a Microsoft SQL Server target:

Preprocess (request)

选项 --preprocess

Using 这个 选项 it is possible to use a preprocessing script for (HTTP) request data pri或者 being sent to the target (e.g. to fine-tune the request). 例如, preprocessing script that appends the dummy parameter value &foo=bar to POST body:

Postprocess (response)

选项 --postprocess

Using 这个 选项 it is possible to use a postprocessing script for (HTTP) response data pri或者 being used by the sqlmap detection engine (e.g. to decode data 或者 to remove junk). 例如, postprocessing script that transforms all lowercase characters to uppercase could be:

Save 选项s in a configuration INI file

选项: --save

It is possible to save the command line 选项s to a configuration INI file. The generated file can then be edited and passed to sqlmap with the -c 选项 as explained above.

Update sqlmap

Switch: --update

Using 这个 选项 you can update the tool to the latest development version directly 从 the Git repository. You obviously need Internet access.

If, for any reason, 这个 operation fails, run git pull 从 your sqlmap working copy. It will perform the exact same operation of switch --update. If you are running sqlmap on Windows, you can use the SmartGit client.

这个 is strongly recommended before rep或者ting any bug to the mailing lists.

Miscellaneous

Use sh或者t mnemonics

选项: -z

It could become tedious to type all desired 选项s and switches, especially for those that are used most often (e.g. --batch --random-agent --ignore-proxy --technique=BEU). There is a simpler and much sh或者ter way how to deal with that problem. In sqlmap it’s called “mnemonics”.

Each 选项 and switch can be written in a sh或者ter mnemonic form using 选项 -z, separated with a comma character (,), where mnemonics represent only the first arbitrarily chosen part of the 或者iginal name. There is no strict mapping of 选项s and switches to their respective sh或者tened counterparts. Only 需要d condition is that there is no other 选项 n或者 switch that has a same prefix as the desired one.

Example:

can be written (one of many ways) in sh或者ter mnemonic form like:

Another example:

can be written in sh或者ter mnemonic form like:

Alerting on successful SQL injection detection

选项: --alert

Make a beep sound when SQL injection is found

Switch: --beep

In case that user uses switch --beep he’ll be warned with a beep sound immediately when SQL injection is found. 这个 is especially useful when there is a large bulk list (选项 -m) of target URLs to be tested.

Cleanup the DBMS 从 sqlmap specific UDF(s) and table(s)

Switch: --cleanup

It is recommended to clean up the back-end数据库management system 从 sqlmap temp或者ary table(s) (e.g. sqlmapoutput) and created user-defined function(s) when you are done taking over the underlying operating system 或者 file system. Switch --cleanup will attempt to clean up the DBMS and the file system wherever possible.

Check for dependencies

Switch: --dependencies

sqlmap in some special cases 需要s independent installation of extra 3rd party libraries (e.g. 选项s -d, switch --os-pwn in case of icmpsh tunneling, 选项 --auth-type in case of NTLM HTTP authentication type, etc.) and it will warn the user only in such special cases. But, if you want to independently check for all those extra 3rd party library dependencies you can use switch --dependencies.

Disable console output col或者ing

Switch: --disable-col或者ing

sqlmap by 默认uses col或者ing while writting to console. In case of undesired effects (e.g. console appearance of uninterpreted ANSI col或者ing codes like \x01\x1b[0;32m\x02[INFO]) you can disable console output col或者ing by using 这个 switch.

Use Google d或者k results 从 specified page number

选项: --gpage

默认sqlmap behavi或者 with 选项 -g is to do a Google search and use the first 100 resulting URLs for further SQL injection testing. However, in combination with 这个 选项 you can specify with 这个 选项 (--gpage) a page other than the first one to retrieve target URLs 从.

Use HTTP parameter pollution

Switch: --hpp

HTTP parameter pollution (HPP) is a method for bypassing WAF/IPS protection mechanisms (explained here) that is particularly effective against ASP/IIS and ASP.NET/IIS platforms. If you suspect that the target is behind such protection, you can try to bypass it by using 这个 switch.

Skip heuristic detection of WAF/IPS protection

Switch: --skip-waf

By 默认, sqlmap automatically sends inside one of starting requests a dummy parameter value containing a deliberately “suspicious” SQL injection payload (e.g. ...&foobar=AND 1=1 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2,3,table_name 从 information_schema.tables WHERE 2>1). If target responds differently than for the 或者iginal request, there is a high possibility that it’s under some kind of protection.

sqlmap will automatically try to identify backend WAF/IPS protection (if any) so user could do appropriate steps (e.g. use tamper scripts with --tamper). Currently around 80 different products are supp或者ted (Airlock, Barracuda WAF, etc.) In case of any problems, user can disable 这个 whole mechanism by providing switch --skip-waf.

Imitate smartphone

Switch: --mobile

Sometimes web servers expose different interfaces toward mobile phones than to desktop computers. In such cases you can enforce usage of one of predetermined smartphone HTTP User-Agent header values. By using 这个 switch, sqlmap will ask you to pick one of popular smartphones which it will imitate in current run.

Example run:

Work in offline mode (only use session data)

Switch: --offline

By using switch --offline sqlmap will use only previous session data in data enumeration. 这个 basically means that there will be zero connection attempts during such run.

Safely remove all content 从 data directory

Switch --purge

In case that user decides to safely remove all content 从 sqlmap’s data directory (e.g. $HOME/.local/share/sqlmap), containing all target details 从 previous sqlmap runs, he can use switch --purge. While purging, all files 从 (sub)directories in data folder will be overwritten with random data, truncated, renamed to random names, (sub)directories will be renamed to random names too, and finally the whole directory tree will be deleted.

Example run:

Conduct th或者ough tests only if positive heuristic(s)

Switch --smart

There are cases when user has a large list of potential target URLs (e.g. provided with 选项 -m) and he wants to find a vulnerable target as fast as possible. If switch --smart is used, only parameters with which DBMS err或者(s) can be provoked, are being used further in 扫描s. Otherwise they are skipped.

Example against a MySQL target:

Select (或者 skip) tests by payloads and/或者 titles

选项 --test-filter

In case that you want to filter tests by their payloads and/或者 titles you can use 这个 选项. 例如, if you want to test all payloads which have ROW keyw或者d inside, you can use --test-filter=ROW.

Example against a MySQL target:

选项 --test-skip=TEST

In case that you want to skip tests by their payloads and/或者 titles you can use 这个 选项. 例如, if you want to skip all payloads which have BENCHMARK keyw或者d inside, you can use --test-skip=BENCHMARK.

Interactive sqlmap shell

Switch: --shell

By using switch --shell user will be presented with the interactive sqlmap shell which has the history of all previous runs with used 选项s and/或者 switches:

Simple wizard interface for beginner users

Switch: --wizard

for beginner用户there is a wizard interface which uses a simple workflow with as little questions as possible. If user just enters target URL and uses 默认answers (e.g. by pressing Enter) he should have a properly set sqlmap run environment by the end of the workflow.

Example against a Microsoft SQL Server target:

API (REST-JSON)

sqlmap can be run through the REST-JSON API, API (abbr. for Application Program Interface) that uses JSON for REST (abbr. for REpresentational State Transfer) communication between server and client instance(s). In plainspeak, server runs the sqlmap 扫描(s), while clients are setting the sqlmap 选项s/switches and pull the results back. Main program file for running the API is sqlmapapi.py, while the client can also be implemented inside the arbitrary user program.

Server runs the sqlmapapi.py by using switch -s, client by using switch -c, while in both cases user can (选项ally) set listening IP address with 选项 -H (默认"127.0.0.1") and listening p或者t with 选项 -p (默认8775). Each client’s “session” can have multiple “tasks” (i.e. sqlmap 扫描 runs), where user can arbitrary choose which task should be currently active.

Inside the client’s command line interface available commands are:

  • help - showing list of available commands along with basic help information
  • new ARGS - starts a new 扫描 task with provided 参数s (e.g. new -u "http://testphp.vulnweb.com/artists.php?artist=1")
  • use TASKID - switches current context to different task (e.g. use c04d8c5c7582efb4)
  • data - retrieves and shows data for current task
  • log- retrieves and shows log for current task
  • status - retrieves and shows status for current task
  • stop - stops current task
  • kill - kills current task
  • list - displays all tasks (for current session)
  • flush - flushes (i.e. deletes) all tasks
  • exit - exits the client interface

Example server run:

Example client run:

General codes used in response JSON data:

  • status:
  • type:
  • returncode

利用计划任务执行命令反弹shell

entry.title: SSRF服务器端请求伪造总结
entry.content:
# 什么是 SSRF

SSRF (Server Side Request Forgery) 即服务端请求伪造，指的是攻击者在未能取得服务器所有权限时，利用服务器漏洞以服务器的身份发送一条构造好的请求给服务器所在内网。

SSRF 攻击通常针对外部网络无法直接访问的内部系统。

SSRF 可以对外网、服务器所在内网、本地进行端口扫描，攻击运行在内网或本地的应用，或者利用 File 协议读取本地文件。

# 漏洞产生原因

1、内网服务防御相对外网服务来说一般会较弱

2、服务端提供了从其他服务器应用获取数据的功能且没有对目标地址作正确的过滤和限制

# 漏洞点

函数 (主要是网络访问，支持伪协议的网络读取)

  • file_get_contents()
  • fsockopen()
  • curl_exec()

伪协议

  • file://：从文件系统中获取文件内容，如，file:///etc/passwd
  • dict://：字典服务器协议，访问字典资源，如，dict:///ip:6739/info
  • gopher://：分布式文档传递服务，可使用 gopherus 生成 payload。

# SSRF 的利用

# 可能存在 SSRF 的信号

  • 能够对外发起网络请求的地方，如在线识图，在线文档翻译，分享，订阅等

  • 从远程服务器请求资源，如远程 URL 上传，静态资源图片

  • 数据库内置功能，如 mongodb 的 copyDatabase 函数

  • 邮件系统，就是接收邮件服务器地址这些地方

  • 文件处理，在线处理工具等，如 ffpmg,ImageMaic，DOCX，PDF，XML 处理器等

  • 看 URL 的关键字，如 source,share,link,src,imageurl,target 等

# 利用方式

使用 curl，实现 dict 协议操作 Redis、file 协议读文件、gopher 协议反弹 Shell 等功能，payload 如下

# 可能的利用点

# 内网服务

  • Apache Hadoop 远程命令执行
  • axis2-admin 部署 Server 命令执行
  • Confluence SSRF
  • counchdb WEB API 远程命令执行
  • dict
  • docker API 远程命令执行
  • Elasticsearch 引擎 Groovy 脚本命令执行
  • ftp /ftps（FTP 爆破）
  • glassfish 任意文件读取和 war 文件部署间接命令执行
  • gopher
  • HFS 远程命令执行
  • http、https
  • imap/imaps/pop3/pop3s/smtp/smtps（爆破邮件用户名密码）
  • Java 调试接口命令执行
  • JBOSS 远程 Invoker war 命令执行
  • Jenkins Scripts 接口命令执行
  • ldap
  • mongodb
  • php_fpm/fastcgi 命令执行
  • rtsp - smb/smbs（连接 SMB）
  • sftp
  • ShellShock 命令执行
  • Struts2 命令执行
  • telnet
  • tftp（UDP 协议扩展）
  • tomcat 命令执行
  • WebDav PUT 上传任意文件
  • WebSphere Admin 可部署 war 间接命令执行
  • zentoPMS 远程命令执行

# Redis 利用

  • 写 ssh 公钥
  • 写 crontab
  • 写 WebShell
  • Windows 写启动项
  • 主从复制加载 .so 文件
  • 主从复制写无损文件

# 云主机

在 AWS、Google 等云环境下，通过访问云环境的元数据 API 或管理 API，在部分情况下可以实现敏感信息等效果。

# SSRF 的防范

  • 过滤返回的信息
  • 统一错误信息
  • 限制请求的端口只能为 Web 端口，只允许访问 HTTP 和 HTTPS 的请求
  • 禁止不常用的协议
  • 对 DNS Rebinding，考虑使用 DNS 缓存或者 Host 白名单

# SSRF 利用

# 协议利用

# SSRF 的过滤绕过

以攻击 127.0.0.1:80 端口为例

# 1、利用 localhost

# 2、利用 [::]

# 3、利用 @

# 4、利用短地址

# 5、利用特殊域名

利用的原理是 DNS 解析

# 6、利用 DNS 解析

在域名上设置 A 记录，指向 127.0.1

# 7、利用上传

# 8、利用 Enclosed alphanumerics

# 9、利用句号

# 10、利用进制转换

# 11、利用特殊地址

# 12、利用协议

# 13、DNS Rebinding

一个常用的防护思路是：对于用户请求的 URL 参数，首先服务器端会对其进行 DNS 解析，然后对于 DNS 服务器返回的 IP 地址进行判断，如果在黑名单中，就禁止该次请求。

但是在整个过程中，第一次去请求 DNS 服务进行域名解析到第二次服务端去请求 URL 之间存在一个时间差，利用这个时间差，可以进行 DNS 重绑定攻击。

要完成 DNS 重绑定攻击，我们需要一个域名，并且将这个域名的解析指定到我们自己的 DNS Server，在我们的可控的 DNS Server 上编写解析服务，设置 TTL 时间为 0。这样就可以进行攻击了，完整的攻击流程为：

  • 服务器端获得 URL 参数，进行第一次 DNS 解析，获得了一个非内网的 IP
  • 对于获得的 IP 进行判断，发现为非黑名单 IP，则通过验证
  • 服务器端对于 URL 进行访问，由于 DNS 服务器设置的 TTL 为 0，所以再次进行 DNS 解析，这一次 DNS 服务器返回的是内网地址。
  • 由于已经绕过验证，所以服务器端返回访问内网资源的结果。

# 14、利用 IPv6

有些服务没有考虑 IPv6 的情况，但是内网又支持 IPv6，则可以使用 IPv6 的本地 IP 如 [::] 0000::1 或 IPv6 的内网域名来绕过过滤。

# CTF 中的 SSRF

待做

# 参考链接

Web 安全学习笔记

网络安全 - SSRF 漏洞原理、攻击与防御

SSRF 绕过方法总结

entry.title: SSTI模板注入漏洞总结
entry.content:
认识SSTI

SSTI 即服务器端模板注入（Server-Side Template Injection）

漏洞成因

服务端接收了用户的恶意输入以后，未经任何处理就将其作为 Web 应用模板内容的一部分，模板引擎在进行目标编译渲染的过程中，执行了用户插入的可以破坏模板的语句，因而可能导致了敏感信息泄露、代码执行、GetShell 等问题。

简单来说就是服务端接受用户的输入并解析执行，当用户输入一些恶意指令时，攻击就产生了。(有SQL注入、XSS那味了)

如何判断是否存在SSTI

1、通过页面渲染返回的内容检测承载的 Payload 是否有得到编译解析，有解析则可以判定含有 Payload 对应模板引擎注入，否则不存在 SSTI。

比如传入sxq{{1+1}}sxq，若返回sxq2sxq，则存在SSTI

2、查看网页源码，如果看到存在如下之类的字符，说明使用了模板引擎

3、如果能得到源码，从源码中看到template()、render()等函数

各种模板引擎介绍与SSTI利用

PHP

常见模板有Twig，smarty，blade

Twig

介绍

Twig被许多开源项目使用，包括Symfony、Drupal8、eZPublish、phpBB、Matomo、OroCRM，许多框架支持Twig，比如Slim、Yii、Laravel 和 Codeigniter。

简单用例

需要注意的一点是，模版引擎一般都默认对渲染的变量值进行编码和转义，所以此处并不会造成XSS

但是，如果渲染的模版内容受到用户的控制，如下

则会发生XSS攻击

语法

变量

使用 .来访问变量中的属性（方法或 PHP 对象的属性，或 PHP 数组单元），Twig还支持访问PHP数组上的项的特定语法

变量可以修改为过滤器，过滤器与变量之间用管道符号隔开 (|)，可以链接多个过滤器，一个过滤器的输出应用于下一个过滤器。例如
